definition: in confusion or disorder/in a confused state of mind/disorder/upheaval/riot/illicit sexual relations/to throw into disorder/to mix up/indiscriminate/random/arbitrary

sentences.english: Nanzhao itself collapsed from internecine warfare shortly after the Tang Dynasty fell.
sentences.chinese: 唐朝灭亡不久，南昭国因内乱也开始崩溃瓦解。

sentences.english: Civil unrest in many of the countries where Lassa fever is endemic has impeded effective control.
sentences.chinese: 发生拉沙热流行的许多国家的内乱阻碍了有效控制。

sentences.english: In feudal times, the inappropriate decisions of the successor to the throne often lead to civil strife in the court.
sentences.chinese: 封建时代皇家立嗣处理不好往往会引发宫廷内乱。

sentences.english: The army is threatening to take over if civil unrest continues.
sentences.chinese: 军方扬言如果内乱继续就实行军管。

definition: internal strife/power struggle/(of members of an organization) to fight each other
internal trouble and outside aggression (idiom); in a mess both domestically and abroad
to go on or send a punitive expedition
